title: Interpretation of a dream about hugging a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the embrace of a dead person in the dream of a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man means embracing the dead person, hugging him, kissing him with tears, and the dead person hugging the living. Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-Sadiq and others: Embracing a dead person in a dream is one of the most frightening and disturbing dreams and causes a state of fear and terror in the souls of the dreamers. There are meanings and indications that we must learn in the coming period, as dreams bring us many warnings and warnings for the coming period and what will happen to the person in public life, and perhaps the most important of them is Seeing the deceased in a dream in all its forms and meanings. Our world-renowned and respected translator Ibn Sirin explained to us in his various interpretations that he presented to us in his interpretive books important meanings and signs that come to the dreamer in the event that he sees a dead person embracing in a dream, which they should know. In detail.Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream. Embracing the dead and hugging is a form of love and company. A hug in a dream can indicate the return of the absent person and reconciliation between quarrels and quarrels. Kissing the dead person in a dream indicates that the dead person will benefit from the fortuneteller’s mercy and supplication, or the dead person’s children will benefit from something from the fortuneteller or his need. To alms on his behalf. Whoever dreams that a dead person has embraced him with love, his life will be long and will be better than the life or money of a dead person. Whoever hugs or shakes hands with a living or dead person in a dream, he will have a long life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is receiving a dead person whom he does not know, then he will take goodness and money from where he does not know. He expects, but if he knows him, he will benefit from this dead person with his money or knowledge. As for whoever sees in a dream that he embraced a dead person or mingled with him in a simple way, his life will be prolonged. And whoever embraces a living person, whoever sees that he embraces a person in his dream and surrounds him with his arm, will be victorious and obtain what he wants. Whoever sees himself kissing a dead person in a dream with lust associates him with goodness, and whoever kisses the hand of a dead person in a dream will be humiliated. But whoever dreams that a dead person has hugged him in a quarrel, his dream is not good and he will die. Whoever sees himself hugging a woman in a dream is falling in love with this world and despairing of the afterlife. Whoever sees in Dreaming that he hugged a person and put his arm around him is not good. Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream. Embracing a dead person in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s longing for the dead. Seeing yourself hugging a dead person in a dream indicates a desire to meet the deceased again. Seeing yourself hugging the dead in a dream It indicates that the dreamer cares a lot about the dead. Embracing the dead in a dream is evidence of his great satisfaction with him and that the dead person is in his home above. Embracing a dead sheikh or scholar in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is on the right path. The dreamer embracing the dead is evidence of the fulfillment of desires in Life. A dreamer who hugs a dead person he does not know in a dream is a sign of goodness coming for that person. Embracing an unknown dead person in a dream is a sign of wealth and abundant money for the dreamer. Seeing a dreamer who has died in a dream is evidence of longevity. Seeing a dreamer’s funeral in a dream It is a sign of kindness and longevity. Embracing the deceased with the dreamer also indicates travel and distance from his family. Embracing the deceased

title: What is the interpretation of seeing someone offering me whole bread in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing the person who served me whole bread in a dream. Bread is one of the staple foods in many countries and is never without a table. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me bread according to the dreamer’s condition? We have collected for you, beloved, interpretations of dreams from the largest books of interpretation. What is the interpretation of seeing someone giving me bread in a woman’s bowl? The ordinary girl who gives someone a piece of bread declares his great love for her and has overcome the difficulties. As Seeing a full loaf of bread in a dream, and she is a bowling woman, indicates her close marriage to a person who loves her very much and wants to reach her, but refuses. Also, seeing an unknown person giving her a whole loaf of bread in a dream indicates the death of the girl’s worries, pain, problems, and misfortunes. Seeing an unmarried woman Offering bread while she eats it with difficulty indicates crises and difficulties that she will face in the near future. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man who gave me bread to a married woman? If a married woman dreams that a strange man other than her husband offers her news and she refuses, this means that her troubles will stop. Also, seeing bread in a dream Full of bread from the husband indicates the narrow comfort and broad diet that this woman and high status will enjoy. Also, seeing moldy bread in a dream indicates instability and moving from one dwelling to a new spacious dwelling, and God knows best. Seeing damp life in a married woman’s dream could That indicates the psychological discomfort that the dreamer will feel in his life and ultimately instability. What is the interpretation of seeing a man giving me bread to a pregnant woman? The pregnant woman took a small part of life from her husband, which indicates her husband’s love for her and not abandoning her and standing by her side during Her birth. Also, seeing a dream about eating bread and bread indicates the date of birth and the ease of giving birth to a male child, God willing, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a man who gave me bread to a man? If a man sees in a dream that he is eating bread and that he is taking it from a beautiful girl with a good face, then this In reality it indicates his close marriage with her. Also, seeing someone taking a whole loaf of bread in a dream indicates generosity and wide satisfaction offered by a friend of a friend and a good and new job. Likewise, if one sees in a dream that he is taking a fresh piece of bread from a stranger he does not know, This indicates his many problems and sorrows. Seeing wet bread in a dream can indicate the deterioration of the dreamer’s condition and many accumulated debts, and it also indicates that the situation is getting worse. What is the interpretation of the vision of someone giving me bread for a divorced woman? If a divorced woman dreams that a stranger is giving her a loaf of bread Whole in a dream, this indicates her second chance to return to her husband. Likewise, seeing a whole piece of bread taken by one of her old friend’s relatives in a dream, this indicates the good morals and religiosity of a divorced woman, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about shoes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a shoe or a package in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, either lost or bought a shoe, with a heel, wearing red, black, white, new, old, torn, narrow, wide, pink, golden shoes for Ibn Sirin and more. Seeing shoes in a dream is one of the disturbing dreams that makes the dreamer wonder about the meanings of the vision, as shoes in a dream usually refer to the partner, whether the lover, husband, fiancé or other, and to see new shoes means a distinguished partner. Interpretation of shoes in a dream If you see your shoes on top of other shoes, someone will usurp your place in your lover's affections. If you are wearing new shoes, you will be lucky in your dealings. The head of the family will demand higher wages. Old and worn shoes indicate diseases and traps set in front of you. Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream Seeing the loss of shoes in a dream, this is evidence of the loss of a loved one, and perhaps losing shoes in a dream is a sign of escaping evil, and whoever dreams in a dream that he is carrying shoes in it. His hand is evidence and this is evidence of the existence of differences and problems in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her shoes have been lost while she is working, this is evidence of the loss of a family member. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying black shoes and they do not fit her, this is evidence of the anxiety and anxiety that this woman is going through in her life, but it will end soon. We will hear good news about this lady soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her shoes are missing, this is evidence of the difficulty of childbirth, and that she will give birth to a male child, and I know. Interpretation of spoils in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is buying shoes and they look beautiful, this is evidence of the fulfillment of the desire that she has had for a long time. Interpretation of shoes in a dream for a man If a man dreams that he is selling his shoes, this is evidence of the worries and difficulties that that person is going through, and if a man dreams that his shoes are lost while working, this is evidence of the settlement of debts, and if a person sees in a dream that he finds new shoes in the sand while sitting, this proves that he will soon marry a good and beautiful girl and live with her happily and happily, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of shoes for a single girl - YouTube

On resolving debts, and if a person sees in a dream that he finds new shoes in the sand while he is sitting, this proves that he will soon marry a good and beautiful girl and live with her happily and happily, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream

preview.html: If you look at thick vaginal hair, this indicates something not good that you see in her affairs, and to make it easier for you to interpret this vision, we are here from the interpreter’s website. We will provide an interpretation and clarify the vision, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream for a single girl, or seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream, is a sign of the failure of things in the life of a single woman. If thick hair is pulled out of the vagina in a dream, this indicates that he will get rid of the condition. Difficult. Seeing thick vaginal hair and being pleased with it is a sign that she is on a bad path in life. Thick vaginal hair in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates problems that fill her life and cannot be solved easily. If she cleans her thick vaginal hair in a dream, this is a sign that it will be solved. A very difficult problem. An unmarried woman who sees that there is a stranger cleaning her hair refers to her as her husband. Either seeing thick hair from the vagina in a dream indicates problems and torture in her life from her work. And thick vaginal hair indicates that she cannot overcome the problems in her life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a wide bay. Interpretation of seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is looking at thick hair in the vagina, this indicates marital problems. Seeing thick vaginal hair in a married woman is a sign of corruption in all aspects of her life in this regard. Time. Seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream indicates envy and magic in her life from those close to her. If a married woman cleans her thick vaginal hair in a dream, this indicates that she is close to goodness. If her husband asks her to clean her thick vaginal hair, this indicates that she is suffering from Problem. Seeing thick, long, black vaginal hair is a sign of sadness in her life that she cannot forget. If a woman tries to clean her vulva hair, this indicates her attempt to get rid of problems. If a woman cleans her private parts permanently, this indicates her good conduct and reputation, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that her vaginal hair is thick, this indicates the delay in her marriage and her sadness at this time. Seeing thick vaginal hair in a dream is a sign of problems and troubles in her life. If she denied having thick vaginal hair in a dream, this indicates That she got rid of a sad matter in her life. If you see yourself removing thick hair from the vagina in a dream, this means that there will be problems that will end soon. And if she asks a stranger to help her clean her pubic hair, this is evidence of her marriage. Seeing thick hair on the vagina The vagina in a dream indicates problems that fill her life and make her very sad. As for seeing long and thick hair in the vagina, it is a sign of magic and work in her life, and God knows best. And if the divorced woman asks her to remove her pubic hair, it appears that he is thinking about returning to her again. Read also: Interpretation of a dream Blood coming out of the vagina for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing thick pubic hair in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there is thick pubic hair

title: Interpretation of the letter Ta in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the letter Ta in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com. The letter Ta is one of the 28 letters of the Arabic alphabet and the letter Ta is the third letter in a row and it varies. Seeing the letter Ta in a dream is possible for the dreamer to see the letter Ta’ in the summary or things with a definition. Ta', all of which have connotations, and today we will present the most important interpretations that came from the great scholars in dream interpretation, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of the letter Ta in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin says that he saw the letter Ta in a dream. Point to goodness. And the benefits are for the fortune teller. Seeing the letter T in a person’s dream indicates that he is approaching marriage or a new job. Seeing fruit indicates the letter T, such as figs or apples and the like, is a sign of lawful nutrition, happiness, and goodness. Seeing the letter T in a dream indicates obedience and compliance with divine commands. See another interpretation: Name The state with the letter S. Interpretation of the letter T in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the letter T in a dream. A person’s worries are a sign of the relief of his worries and the collapse of his problems. Seeing the letter T written on the wall in a dream indicates that it is a sign of happiness and kindness that he will receive from God. Seeing the letter t indicates the debtor at the end of his debts and livelihood. Nearby. Seeing a coffin in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If a person sleeps in it, this is an indication that he has attained an important position. Seeing an empty coffin in a dream is to fulfill desires and dreams in the life of the fortuneteller who seeks. Seeing a crown in a dream is a metaphor for pride, prestige, and high status, and an indication of the knowledge and knowledge that the viewer acquires in His life. Seeing a lupine in a dream is a sign of poverty and need, and a sick person is a sign of death or an increase in his illness. Seeing the Tashahhud in prayer in the dreamer’s good condition, happiness, kindness, and the fulfillment of dreams. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing names in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter Ta in a dream for Nablus. Seeing a hill or hills in a dream. It indicates the high status and prestige that the dreamer enjoys. Walking in the hills is a sign of the collapse of anxiety and sadness. Seeing greetings and peace in a dream is a sign that bad things will be removed from the dreamer’s life and happiness and prosperity will be achieved. Seeing berries in a dream means abundance of sustenance, offspring, and money, and berries are a sign of multiple goodness and benefits. In the life of the seer. A dragon in a dream. A sign of influence and power and turning into a dragon is a sign that the seer will live a long time. Seeing figs in a dream increases nutrition, money and happiness in the life of the seer, and white figs are more worthy of praise in a dream than black figs. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a kiss On the head in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the words with the letter T in a dream. Seeing dates in a dream if the sick person eats them is a sign of his recovery and good health in his body. Seeing dates in a dream indicates a single woman is approaching her engagement. Seeing corrupt dates in a dream indicates many sins, transgressions, and a bad reputation. Enlarging the dream is a sign of victory. Against enemies, sincere repentance, and many blessings

title: Interpretation of dreams about cutting my hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was cutting my hair. Cutting hair in a dream is one of the dreams that many people have, and its interpretations vary depending on whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, as well as on the person’s feeling after shaving, is he happy or sad? Other symbols whose meanings we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. I dreamed that I was cutting my hair. There are many indications mentioned by scholars regarding seeing cut hair in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If you see in a dream that you cut the ends of your hair that were fragile in order to restore their health and strength again, This is a sign that there is a role model in your life whose opinion and advice you can take. In all matters of your life. In the event that someone has really thin hair and dreams that you are cutting it completely, this is a sign that in the coming period he will present a very important matter on which many things depend, so he feels stressed and exhausted. If you dream that you are cutting your hair to make any change In your life, this indicates the state of boredom and despair that dominates you and your desire for something new to happen in your life. I dreamed that I cut my hair in order to renew the Your appearance and become more beautiful, this will lead to your dedication to work and thus making a lot of effort to improve your living conditions and social status. If during your sleep you see that you are cutting your hair using your hand and pulling it hard, this is a sign of many problems and difficulties that you face in your life that cause you great sadness. , so you should seek help to do this. Do not fall into a state of depression. If you go to someone to cut your hair in your dream, this is a sign that in the coming days you will go through a difficult financial crisis and your need to borrow money to be able to pay off your debts. What is the interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a single woman? If it is a girl She dreams of someone she does not know cutting her hair without her consent, this means that she is surrounded by powerful and powerful people who want to harm her or control her life. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is cutting her hair in order to renew her appearance, this leads to her marrying the man she loves soon and she must prepare for that If a Virgo sees that her hair is very long and silky and then cuts it completely, this is a sign that she is going through a difficult psychological state at this time in her life, which may be due to someone with her. A romantic relationship. Cutting bangs in one dream symbolizes that this girl is characterized by courage, determination, and a strong will that allows her to achieve all her goals and ambitions in life. I dreamed that I cut my hair and I was happy being single. If a girl dreams that she cuts her hair and she is happy, this means that God - Glory be to Him - He will fulfill a dream or wish that she was desperately seeking. If the time for Hajj comes and the girl sees in a dream that she is cutting her hair and she is happy, this is a sign that she will go to the Sacred House of God to perform the Hajj and feel comfortable and happy. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a married woman? If A married woman had a dream during...

title: Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: It refers to more than one meaning in the world of dreams that can indicate good or bad according to its color and condition, as well as according to the social and psychological state of the dreamer, and we will mention evidence about this article provided by the interpreter. Com, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream of an unmarried girl means that she is living a love story in those days. If you see a mobile phone in a girl’s dream, it may mean that someone is offering to marry her, and the more the phone More valuable and elegant. It indicates the status of the one to whom it appears, and God knows best. If the fiancée sees herself talking to her on the phone. This indicates that she is living a happy engagement period with her partner and that their relationship will continue until they get married, God willing. Or if the girl sees that she is talking to her ex-boyfriend. Over the phone. The vision indicates the return of their relationship again and the end of disputes. If a girl sees her broken cell phone in her dream and feels sorry. It is one of the unfavorable visions, because it indicates that she will be exposed to a scandal or lose her purity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the girl sees herself talking to Her fiancé is on the phone, but she looks sad. She says that she is forced to be engaged to this young man and she does not love him. And if her fiancée sees that her phone was stolen from a girl she does not know. It indicates that her fiancé will leave her to marry a second girl, and God knows best. When a girl sees someone she knows stealing her phone in a dream. This is a sign of her hatred for this person and her failure to accept the truth. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a mobile phone for a single womanInterpretation of tracking a mobile phone in a dream for a married womanIf the dreamer’s phone breaks in a dream, this is a sign that she will be vulnerable to gossip. And a lot of rumors about her fame and honor, which makes her feel With crushing and shadows. Seeing a woman losing the phone in a dream, but she was able to find it. It shows that he will have disagreements with someone, but he will get rid of them soon. But if the woman sees that she is in contact with her husband and her duties are a woman, then this is a sign of marital infidelity, and God knows best. If a woman sees that she is calling her sister on her cell phone. It indicates that the dreamer will call her sister in the next few days. Either if the woman sees someone she knows calling her and she is satisfied with the call. One of the signs is hearing good news about this person in the coming period. And if he sees a young woman She calls her phone while she is of childbearing age. This indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. A burning mobile phone in a dream is a bad vision. Which indicates the betrayal of the dreamer’s husband and her acquaintance with many men and immorality with them, God forbid. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream about Man and its meaning: Seeing a black mobile phone in a man’s dream if his appearance is elegant and youthful. The vision indicates that the dreamer holds a high position in the state. If someone sees an old or broken black mobile phone, this indicates that he has been betrayed by his closest relatives, and God knows best. But if If one sees that his mobile phone has been stolen in a dream, it means that he will face major financial problems

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing twins in a married woman’s dream is the most accurate interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman: It is one of the visions that scholars agree is benign, as long as the woman feels happy after waking up from the dream, and the meanings of the dream are good, such as the children being in good health and the woman being so. Also in good health and does not feel tired or stressed. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman in detail. If a married woman sees in her dream that she has given birth to twins, this indicates that there is something that she desires very much. This matter will happen to her, but she does not realize the burden and responsibility that will fall on her. Because she If she achieves what she wants, she may aspire to advance in her career or her husband will find a better job. But these dreams require some effort and work, whether before or after they come true, so the dreamer must recalculate and realize the results of her goal before it is achieved and causes her severe fatigue. If a married woman sees that she has given birth to twins and that she is breastfeeding them, this is an indication of the nature of the relationship. She is a respected and loved person, and her whole family depends on her for many things, and this dream may also be a sign. How important your life is in your wife’s life, especially if you are worried about what If your husband still loves you or not. As for the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman who sees her unmarried sister or one of her relatives giving birth to twins. This is evidence that the single woman is suffering from severe pressure because of what everyone around her expects. She may be in a transitional stage. , and it is expected that she will get married or achieve great success in an important academic year. This girl also feels that what she has achieved in life is not worth anything other than what she really wants to achieve. Therefore, she does not feel satisfied with herself and wants to achieve more, which makes her constantly unhappy. So if This dream came to you, so you should talk to her and find out why you are worried inside to help her. Interpretation of a dream about twins for another person. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman if she sees that her husband comes carrying two twin children who are not hers or that her husband is expecting twins from another woman. This is evidence that the dreamer is hiding An important secret from her husband, because she may have caused harm to a family member. Or slandered someone, and this dream is evidence that the husband will soon discover what the dreamer was hiding from him. If the dreamer sees that the mother gave birth to her twins to give birth to them, this is evidence that the woman is married. She will live a happy life with her husband and will give birth to many children, God willing. You see a married woman giving birth to twins. Her husband indicates next to her that food comes to us in abundance and that she will return all of it to the house. This livelihood may be in the form of money or children, and the dreamer may be pregnant but she did not discover it. After. If a married woman is already pregnant, then a dream about twins is normal, because women in general. She really likes the idea of ​​having twins, especially if they are identical, but there is no telling what gender the baby will be and whether they are twins or not. Interpretation of seeing twins in A married woman dreams that she has a twin sister or brother, but he does not exist in reality. This is evidence that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a husband in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s betrayal in a dream: There are some problems that occur between spouses, but there are some problems that are not tolerated and others are unforgivable. They are marital infidelity and can cause divorce and the collapse of the home - a rumor that we hear about constantly, and through our article we will learn about it. On the interpretation of dreams and visions of betrayal of a husband in a dream.Interpretation of a dream of betrayal of a husband in a dreamInterpretation of a husband’s betrayal of a married woman by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin said that this vision is one of the things that brings goodness to its owner, and although betrayal in reality can cause destruction in the home, in dreams it is considered It is good for its owner, in addition to being an annoying dream for everyone, and its interpretation varies according to the social status of the priest, as he said that whoever sees her husband cheating on her, then the dream is good and shows the happiness and joy that they will feel in marriage and comfort in it, as some people do. It was interpreted as a sign of an increase in the bond between the spouses and an increase in the love relationship between them, and she said that it indicates that the husband loves his wife greatly, respects her among people, and loves her deeply, and as for betraying her. The wife in her husband turns out to be pure and unparalleled and protects her husband and his honor. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a husband cheating on a single woman Some engaged women and those about to get married may see that their husband is cheating on them in the dream and this sign indicates that their relationship will end and the relationship between them will not be complete. Her fiancé is cheating on her with another girl through a few letters and phone calls, and going out with her shows that she will continue her life with an honest man. He is wonderful and loves her, but if a single woman sees that her fiancé is married, the relationship is in bed with another girl, then this indicates that marital life will pass between them with many problems and issues. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a husband cheating on a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that her husband is cheating on her with another woman, this indicates a high probability that she will be pregnant with a boy and will bring goodness and love with him and that it will be fair. Some problems in the dream are possible if she gives birth to a girl. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bachelor’s betrayal. Some young men may see that he is cheating on his girlfriend in a dream, and this is evidence that he is going through a strong and successful love relationship, but he will face problems that he will face to complete the marriage and the possibility that it will be so. It is necessary to approach God and ask for forgiveness for what he did in the past. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream Interpretation of a dream about the betrayal of a widow’s husband He lives in a state of sadness since her husband left her and thinks about him all the time, but if the widow sees that his wife is alive and deceives her in the dream. This is evidence that she is a loyal wife to her deceased husband and loves her very much. However, if a widow sees that her deceased husband is cheating on her in a dream with a woman she knows, then this is considered evidence of his hatred for this woman and that she is undesirable and does not like goodness and considers her indifferent.
